archimate:TechnologyService.name: AzureManagementGroups
archimate:TechnologyService.documentation:
Efficiently apply governance controls and manage groups of Azure subscriptions https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/features/management-groups/
Group your subscriptions Easily manage your Azure subscriptions by grouping them together and taking actions in bulk.
Mirror your organizationâ€™s structure Create a hierarchy of Azure management groups tailored to your organization to efficiently manage your subscriptions and resources.
Apply policies or access control to any service Use our full platform integration to apply governance conditions such as policies, access controls, or full-fledged blueprints to any Azure service.
Related products and services Azure Policy: Implement corporate governance and standards at scale for Azure resources Azure Blueprints: Enabling quick, repeatable creation of governed environments Cost Management + Billing: Optimize what you spend on the cloud, while maximizing cloud potential Azure Resource Graph: Get visibility into all your resources fast
